description: Defenders atop a castle wall during a siege are shown utilizing peculiar methods of defense, specifically throwing what appear to be water balloons at the unseen attackers below. The scene is chaotic, with arrows flying, contrasting sharply with the child-like nature of the projectiles being deployed. This juxtaposition highlights the absurdism of the situation, where medieval warfare is met with a comically ineffective defense strategy, made more pointed by the presence of traditional siege elements like a ladder and attacking soldiers at the base of the wall.
caption: "Hot oil! We need hot oil! ... Forget the water balloons!"
